commit.message:
toplev.c (display_help): Prefix "f" to "sched-verbose=".

        * toplev.c (display_help): Prefix "f" to "sched-verbose=".
        * haifa-sched.c: Update -fsched-verbose comments to use "=".

From-SVN: r33172

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+2000-04-15  David Edelsohn  <edelsohn@gnu.org>
+
+	* toplev.c (display_help): Prefix "f" to "sched-verbose=".
+	* haifa-sched.c: Update -fsched-verbose comments to use "=".

 	* Makefile.in (ggc-page.o): Now includes toplev.h.
